title: Expert Course on ICT-Utilized Language Instruction Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone proficiency and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen competencies in designing ICT-integrated language lessons under smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Participants can create ICT-integrated language lesson designs using mobile-friendly tools.
Participants can develop smartphone-based assessment rubrics to measure learners' growth processes.
Participants can revise digital instructional materials at least three times incorporating peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
